year3Ques.question: ______ is an electronic device which processes instructions given to it.
_____ is the box that contains the engine of the computer.
The full meaning of C.P.U is _________
________ is used to type data into the computer.
_______ is a part of the computer used to move the cursor on the screen.
________ is used to print out what is inside the computer on a piece of paper.
Which of these is not part of taking care of the computer.
options: by not putting heavy objects on it

year3Ques.question: ______ is a program that allows us to do many tasks on the computer.
Which of these is not part of a computer.
_______ are those objects a computer saves our work into.
The full meaning of R.A.M is _______
There are ______ type of computer storage devices.
_______ is an example of internal storage devices.
which of these is not a feature of storage devices.
options: they can store different types of work

year3Ques.question: The work in ______ can be changed and saved again.
There are _______ type of compact disk (CD).
_______ has storage capacity while _______ has no storage capacity.
The following are functions of a storage device except _______.
options: they are used to store computer programs
they are used to store computer errors
they are used to install software
they are used to store and play music
year3Ques.answer: they are used to store computer errors

year3Ques.question: The following are ways of caring for storage devices except_______.
options: Keeping them in a dusty place
keeping them in a well ventilated place
not allowing liquids to drop into them
year3Ques.answer: Keeping them in a dusty place

year3Ques.question: Which of these is not an example of storage devices.
